it.polimi.se2018.model.events

Class ViewMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.events.ViewMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChooseValue, DiceSwap, MoveDice, PlaceDie, SelectCard, SelectDie, SelectDifficulty

    public class ViewMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This Class represents the event through which the View(Observable) notifies the Controller(Observer) about an action performed by the user. Possible additional data requested to perform an action will be encapsulated by more specific events that inherit from this class.
    Author:
    giorgiolabate
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
